DOC.brief_title: Assessing Usability Clinical Utility Congo Red Dot Test : A Case-control Study
DOC.detailed_description: A case-control study ( n=150 ) evaluate clinical utility Congo Red test GV-005 follow woman clinical diagnosis preeclampsia clinically healthy woman postpartum period . Women preeclampsia ( n=100 ) ( case ) clinically healthy woman ( n=50 ) ( control ) hospitalize postpartum recruit trial . All woman ask provide urine sample . Samples collect daily woman 's hospitalization . The Congo Red test GV-005 standard urine dipstick proteinuria test perform lab technician within 72 hour sample collection . The purpose research evaluate progression urine congophilia postpartum follow patient diagnosed preeclampsia clinically healthy woman .
DOC.criteria: Postpartum Clinical diagnosis preeclampsia ( severe , mild superimpose ) include eclampsia ( n=100 ) OR Clinically healthy ( n=50 ) Eligible consent research Agree comply study procedure Able give inform consent
